CustodyItemRgltyCodeVio.name: CustodyItemRgltyCodeVio
CustodyItemRgltyCodeVio.description: Represents a junction between a custody item and the related regulatory code violation. The violation can be related to laws, regulations, or code that is associated with the custody item.

CustodyItemId.description: The custody item that's associated with the regulatory code violation.

Description.description: The description of the custody item regulatory code violation record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

Name.description: The name of the custody item regulatory code violation record.

RegulatoryCodeViolationId.description: The regulatory code violation that's associated with the custody item.

Status.description: The status of the custody item with reference to the regulatory code violation. Picklist values aren't predefined for this field. Before you create a record, ensure that your Salesforce admin has defined picklist values based on your organizationâ€™s requirement.
